meanings.definition: A surgical procedure in which a fiber-optic instrument is inserted through the abdominal wall to view the organs in the abdomen or to perform minor surgery.
meanings.sent1: During the laparoscopy, the doctor used a tiny camera to see inside the belly.
meanings.sent2: The laparoscopy revealed a small growth that needed to be removed.
meanings.sent3: The laparoscopy was like a secret peek into the tummy's world.
meanings.sent4: Her laparoscopy was a magical journey through the hidden chambers of her abdomen.
meanings.sent5: The laparoscopy painted a vivid picture of the inner workings of the body.
